ComicInfo.Series: Ka-Zar: Lord of the Savage Land
ComicInfo.Summary: THE CHAMPION OF THE SAVAGE LAND IS NOT WHO YOU EXPECT! For years, Ka-Zar has thought himself the master of the Savage Land. Turns out he’s only a tolerated guest…and not nearly as powerful as he believed. Domovoy’s power grows as the land decays! When the Plunders discover the mysterious subterranean Cradle, they think they’ve found the answer. But what’s born in the Cradle will bring only death…
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-30 18:59:15. [CVDB898355]
ComicInfo.Inker: Alvaro Lopez, Belardino Brabo, Lebeau Underwood, Marc Deering
ComicInfo.Characters: Ka-Zar, Matthew Plunder, Shanna, Zabu, Zira
